data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Chimbu, Papua New Guinea. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chimbu, Papua New Guinea
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 291,800 people living in Chimbu through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.section_summary: On average, 55 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Chimbu, Papua New Guinea.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Chimbu, Papua New Guinea.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 208,310 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Chimbu.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Chimbu
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 67,091 believers living in Chimbu, Papua New Guinea.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.
